<title level="1" pfs="">[Gaetane](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2324)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 42

**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 42

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Gaetane](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2324)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Werecreature" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=243" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 359</row>

**Perception** +27; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +25

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Rat Empathy** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Gaetane can communicate with rodents.

**Items**
_[+1 resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_, [Oathbow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=392) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +28 

**Will** +25 

</row>

**HP** 315

**Weaknesses**
silver 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +28 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d10+10 piercing plus curse of the wererat

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_oathbow_ +30 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 ft.](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 piercing

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" />  (concentrate, polymorph, primal, transmutation); human with fist +24 for 1d4+10 bludgeoning, or Small rat with Speed 30 feet, climb 10 feet.

**Curse of the Wererat**  ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) This curse affects only humanoids. Saving Throw DC 34 Fortitude save. On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into a wererat until dawn. The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

**Deadly Aim** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirement** Gaetane hasn't attempted a Strike during his turn yet; **Effect** Gaetane makes a ranged Strike against his target at a –2 penalty. He gains a +6 circumstance bonus to damage on that Strike.

**Distracting Shot**   If Gaetane critically hits a creature with a ranged weapon, or hits a creature at least twice on the same turn with a ranged weapon, and if that creature is one he has used his oathbow to swear an oath to destroy, that creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the stat of Gaetane's next turn.

**Hunted Shot** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Gaetane makes two ranged oathbow Strikes against a target. If both hit the same target, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. He applies his multiple attack penalty to each Strike normally.

**Moon Frenzy**  ([Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) When a full moon appears in the night sky, the wererat must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws by 2. When the moon sets or the sun rises, the wererat returns to humanoid form and is fatigued for 2d4 hours.

**Targeting Shot** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Requirement** Gaetane is currently suffering a multiple attack penalty; **Effect** Gaetane aims carefully, then makes an oathbow Strike; he ignores the target's concealed condition and all cover.

</column>
name: Gaetane
